text: Evan (pexemberen, ku nave wan borine) hene! Ji nisa (Adem) u ji nisa wan kesen, ku me ewan bi Nuh ra hildabune (keleke) u ji nisa Ibrahim u Israil (Yâ€™equb) in. Me ji wan ra, re daye nisane u me ewan (di nava kesan da bi pexemberi) hilbijartine. Gava beraten Yezdane dilovan ji wan ra te xwendine ji xwe va dicin, bi giryane ve dicin secde
